verses.roman:
śuni,--'mahāprabhu' yābena śrī-vṛndāvane
dina kata rahi' tāra' bhṛtya dui-jane"

synonyms: śuni—I hear; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yābena—will go; śrī-vṛndāvane—to Vṛndāvana; dina kata—for some days; rahi'-staying; tāra'-please deliver; bhṛtya—servants; dui-jane—two persons.
translation: "My Lord, I have heard that You are going to Vṛndāvana. After You stay here at Vārāṇasī for some days, please deliver us, for we are Your two servants."
